hotels.title: Ocean-View Bay of Islands Luxury Apartment Stay
hotels.description: Escape your everyday and watch the world go by from your little slice of New Zealand paradise at Marina Cove Boutique Luxury Accommodation. Tucked away in Opua, the gateway to the Bay of Islands, these self-contained apartments offer a secluded sanctuary where you can truly unwind, with a backdrop of breathtaking 180-degree ocean views and a soundtrack of birdsong. Embrace the serenity from your private deck, complete with BBQ set-up, or head out to explore the spectacular landscapes - with white-sand beaches, picturesque coastal walkways, historic harbours and big-game fishing all within reach, you’ll find plenty on your doorstep.
